f418.value: 5A Akademika Chelomeya Street, Moscow, Russian Federation, 117630

f420.value: Public Joint-Stock Company “FGC UES” (“Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System”) and its subsidiaries (the “Group”) act as the natural monopoly operator for the Russian Unified National Electric Grid (the “UNEG”). The Group’s principal operating activities consist of providing electricity transmission services, providing connection to the electricity grid, maintaining the electricity grid system, technical supervision of grid facilities and investment activities in the development of the UNEG.
